00037 // QTestSuite class
00038 //
00039 class FUTestSuite
00040 {
00041 public:
00042     virtual bool RunTest(FUTestBed& testBed, FULogFile& fileOut, bool& __testSuiteDone, size_t testIndex) = 0;
00043 };
00044 
00046 // Helpful Macros
00047 //
00048 #if defined(_FU_ASSERT_H_) && defined(_DEBUG)
00049 #define FailIf(a) \
00050     if ((a)) { \
00051         fileOut.WriteLine(__FILE__, __LINE__, " Test('%s') failed: %s.", szTestName, #a); \
00052         extern bool skipAsserts; \
00053         if (!skipAsserts) { \
00054             __DEBUGGER_BREAK; \
00055             skipAsserts = ignoreAssert; } \
00056         return false; }
00057 
00058 #else // _FU_ASSERT_H_ && _DEBUG
00059 
00060 #define FailIf(a) \
00061     if ((a)) { \
00062         fileOut.WriteLine(__FILE__, __LINE__, " Test('%s') failed: %s.", szTestName, #a); \
00063         return false; }
00064 
00065 #endif // _FU_ASSERT_H_
00066 
00067 #define PassIf(a) FailIf(!(a))
00068 
00069 #define Fail { bool b = true; FailIf(b); }
00070 
00072 // TestSuite Generation Macros.
00073 // Do use the following macros, instead of writing your own.
00074 //
00075 #ifdef ENABLE_TEST
00076 #define TESTSUITE_START(suiteName) \
00077 FUTestSuite* _test##suiteName; \
00078 static class FUTestSuite##suiteName : public FUTestSuite \
00079 { \
00080 public: \
00081     FUTestSuite##suiteName() : FUTestSuite() { _test##suiteName = this; } \
00082     bool RunTest(FUTestBed& testBed, FULogFile& fileOut, bool& __testSuiteDone, size_t testIndex) \
00083     { \
00084         switch (testIndex) { \
00085             case ~0u : { \
00086                 if (testBed.IsVerbose()) { \
00087                     fileOut.WriteLine("Running %s...", #suiteName); \
00088                 }
00089 
00090 #define TESTSUITE_TEST(testIndex, testName) \
00091             } return true; \
00092         case testIndex: { \
00093             static const char* szTestName = #testName;
00094 
00095 #define TESTSUITE_END \
00096             } return true; \
00097         default: { __testSuiteDone = true; return true; } \
00098         } \
00099         fileOut.WriteLine(__FILE__, __LINE__, " Test suite implementation error."); \
00100         return false; \
00101     } \
00102 } __testSuite;
00103 
00104 #define RUN_TESTSUITE(suiteName) \
00105     extern FUTestSuite* _test##suiteName; \
00106     testBed.RunTestSuite(_test##suiteName);
00107 
00108 #define RUN_TESTBED(testBedObject, szTestSuiteHead, testPassed) { \
00109     extern FUTestSuite* _test##szTestSuiteHead; \
00110     testPassed = testBedObject.RunTestbed(_test##szTestSuiteHead); }
00111 
00112 #else // ENABLE_TEST
00113 
00114 // The code will still be compiled, but the linker should take it out.
00115 #define TESTSUITE_START(suiteName) \
00116     extern FUTestSuite* _test##suiteName = NULL; \
00117     inline bool __testCode##suiteName(FULogFile& fileOut, const char* szTestName) { { fileOut; szTestName;
00118 #define TESTSUITE_TEST(testIndex, testName) } {
00119 #define TESTSUITE_END } return true; }
00120 #define RUN_TESTSUITE(suiteName)
00121 #define RUN_TESTBED(testBedObject, szTestSuiteHead, testPassed) testPassed = true;
00122 
00123 #endif
00124 
00125 #endif // _FU_TESTBED_H_
